DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy of Eductyl versus placebo for treatment of patients with dyschesia treated by rectal rehabilitation.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of EductylÂ® Versus Placebo for Treatment of Dyschesia
DOC.criteria: Male or female over 18 years Patients with dyschesia Prescription of rehabilitation for dyschesia Rectal diseases Pain killers Pregnant women Breast feeding patients Noncompliant patients
